text:
The Mayor of Champaign, Illinois just signed a sweeping executive order giving her the ability to ban the sale of firearms and ammunition because of...Wuhan coronavirus? There are no cases of the virus in town or the surrounding areas. 

https://t.co/CLOHveHWxU

urls.title: Banning the Sale of Firearms and Ammunition Because of Wuhan Virus? An Illinois Mayor Just Signed an Executive Order to Do It
urls.description: UPDATE: The city is attempting to clarify, by claiming specific details in their own declaration, which you can read below, don't exist. Special Statement Clarifying City Code Provisions approved 3/13/20 pic.twitter.com/yuzYlDjikX—

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela
